creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: two female travelers turning towards male attendant who carries two green boxes attached to a pole over his PL shoulder; grassy plain in background with white and yellow egrets; Mt. Fuji in background at URQ, rising upwards and out of image border; flock of black birds at upper center

title: Hara, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
